title: Detox Herbal Slimming Tea Pack Of 3 - Medinutrica
author: Name
description: Detox Herbal Slimming Tea is a unique extract to remove all toxins from body, regenerates new cells and boosts energy level.
cleaned_text: Description - Slim Mantra Detox Energy Drink is a unique blend of Ginseng Extract, Green Coffee extract, Green Tea extract to remove all toxins from body, regenerates new cells and boosts energy level. It is a natural fat burner and increases body metabolism. Dr Jain's Detoxification Formula is made from 100% natural ingredients & herbs and does not contain artificial chemicals. Ingredients - Note: Dosage: 1. Replace one of the meals of the day with Slim Mantra every day. For example instead of eating your regular lunch, drink Slim Mantra, which will provide enough nutrients in 230* kcal along with satiety. For best results, it is recommended to replace dinner with Slim Mantra daily. 2. Regular Consumption maintains & fulfils Nutritional requirements of the body for healthy life. For faster results, walk or exercise daily Caution: 1. Store in cool & dry place. 2. Not to be consumed by infants and pregnant women except when medically advised. 3. Not for medicinal use. How To Use - Step 1 Mix 1-2 gm (Spoon) of Detox Power in 150 hot or child water Step 2 Stir well & enjoy the drink Step 3 It can be taken 2/3 time in a day Benefits - 2 in 1 Combo of Formula 2 in 1 combo of Formula 1 plus Whey protein (USA source).Therefore no additional protein is required. Unique Combination of 37 Vitamins Unique combination of 37 Vitamins, Minerals and High Fiber with special Ayurvedic weight loss product for fat burning and boosting metabolism. Meal Replacement Modern Nutritional Supplement with Meal Replacement for Slim Shake for Weight Loss. Body Detoxification Contains Herbal weight loss herb used for controlling hunger and high Fiber for Body Detoxification. Fast & Easy Way To Lose Weight Fast & easy way to lose weight naturally without any side-effects Safe For Diabetic Patients Provides very less calories and is safe for Diabetic patients. Chocolate Flavor Tasty blend of American Chocolate flavor Videos - FAQ's - Whey Protein Concentrate, Soy Protein Isolate, Fructose Powder, Glycine Max (INS 640), Soy Lecithine Powder, Oat Fibre, Stabilizer (Guar gum (INS 412)), Inulin, Bulking Agent (Cellulose Powder (INS 460)), Calcium 508), Curcuma longa Extract , Sweetener (Sucralose (INS 955)) and Cocoa Powder.
